QuestData.Title: The Mother Lode
QuestData.Description: Hey we got ourselves a crisis here! Our zeppelin "The Mother Lode" crashed onto the south mountain range.$b$bIt was supposed to only be on an observation mission, what could have happened?$b$bWe got to get down there quick and I'm going to need your help on this.$b$bAre you with me?
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet up with Kimzee Pinchwhistle at the Wreck of the Mother Lode.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh my gosh, this is way worse than I thought it was gonna be. I'm really going to need a hand with getting these survivors out of here.$b$bGood thing I have you on the payroll.
